TopicTitle: Dynamic Aerospace Ventures - Reverse engineered aircraft, second release

Articles.Content:
DAV X-99 Cylon

The Cylon was reverse engineered from what was originally believed to be a crashed alien spacecraft (but was later determined to be a shopping cart caught in the grill of a honda civic) Based on reports from Jeb "Apollo" Kerman, it has the face of a warthog and handles almost as well as one, and so say we all.

(artist's concept. He's since been fired)

DAV X-301 Deafglider

The Deafglider is an ungainly, bent-wing, rocket assisted take off, humalien spacecraft, armed with two of the deadliest objects known to man; steel I beams with rockets taped to them. And an antenna.

Both crafts are unfortunately available here:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/gmkxy4tvu1zr3uo/DAV%27s%20reverse%20engineered%20spaceships.rar?dl=0
Nice! Can you build the original Cylon Raider too?
